doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Satya Ranjan Sutradhar
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Satya Ranjan Sutradhar is a Medicine Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Endocrinology), MCPS, MACP (USA). He is a Professor & Head (Retd) (Medicine) at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Satya Ranjan Sutradhar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. M. Nazrul Islam Siddiqui
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Endocrinology), FCPS (USA), FRCP (UK), FACE (USA)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. M. Nazrul Islam Siddiqui is a Endocrinologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Endocrinology), FCPS (USA), FRCP (UK), FACE (USA). He is a Former Professor & Head, Endocrinology & Metabolism at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. M. Nazrul Islam Siddiqui at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. A.B.M. Kamrul Hasan
doctor.info: Dr. A.B.M. Kamrul Hasan is a Endocrinologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Endocrinology), MACE (USA). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Endocrinology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. A.B.M. Kamrul Hasan at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 4.30pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Nizamul Karim Khan
doctor.info: Dr. Nizamul Karim Khan is a Diabetes Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DEM (BIRDEM). He is a Assistant Professor, Endocrinology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Nizamul Karim Khan at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 11am to 2pm (Sun, Mon, Tue & Wed) & 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

chamber.visitingTime: 11am to 2pm (Sun, Mon, Tue & Wed) & 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday)

doctor.name: Dr. Mir Rabeya Aktar
doctor.workplace: President Abdul Hamid Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Mir Rabeya Aktar is a Endocrinologist in Mymensingh. Her qualification is MBBS, CCD (BIRDEM), DEM (BSMMU). She is a Assistant Professor, Endocrinology at President Abdul Hamid Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Mir Rabeya Aktar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 2pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Palash Kumar Chanda
doctor.info: Dr. Palash Kumar Chanda is a Endocrinologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DEM (BSMMU). He is a Consultant, Endocrinology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Palash Kumar Chanda at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh is 5pm to 8pm (Sun, Mon, Tue & Thu).

doctor.name: Dr. Ershad Mondal
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Endocrinology and Metabolism, BIRDEM, Dhaka)
doctor.info: Dr. Ershad Mondal (Endocrinologist and Diabetologist). He has obtained MBBS degree from Mymensingh Medical College, Mymensingh in 2008. He completed MD in Endocrinology and Metabolism from BIRDEM Academy under Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Dhaka in July 2020. He gives treatment to the Diabetic, Thyroid, Infertile couple, Growth problem in children, Obesity, Overweight, Cholesterol problem, Excess body hair, Excess hair in Face of the patients. He is regularly practicing in LABAID Diagnostic Centre, Mymensingh from 3.30 pm to 9 pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Anowar Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Anowar Hossain is a Endocrinologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MPhil, MD (Endocrinology), MACE. He is an Associate Professor & Head, Department of Endocrinology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Pranto Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Anowar Hossain at Pranto Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
